content: hinterland-inspired hat version two version one i materials approx 165-220 yds worsted weight yarn used vickie howell sheep ish in espresso-ish us8 5mm 16in circular needles & dpns cable needle cn darning needle forgottenyarn hinterland �  1 pattern notes there are two versions of this hat version one is more plain with knits purls and cables version two has more cables adding a zigzag pattern to make the hat bigger or smaller add or subtract by multiples of 18 ribbing for the brim changes depending on the number of stitches casted on ex cast on 108 k3p3 or cast on 82 k2p2 or rib however you want repeat the last decreasing row more than once depending on the number of stitches casted on i version one was made with one skein of bulky yarn loops & threads charisma in charcoal using us11 needles and casting on 54 stitches abbreviations ktbl= knit through the back loop c6b= slip 3 stitches onto your cn & hold back knit 3 stitches from the left working needle knit the stitches from your cn c6f= slip 3 stitches onto your cn & hold front knit 3 stitches from the left working needle knit the stitches from your cn k2tog= knit 2 stitches together p2tog= purl 2 stitches together ssk= slip slip knit c4b= slip 2 stitches onto your cn & hold back knit 2 stitches from the left working needle knit the stitches from your cn c4f= slip 2 stitches onto your cn & hold front knit 2 stitches from the left working needle knit the stitches from your cn sl1 k2tog psso= slip 1 stitch knitwise knit 2 stitches together pass slipped stitch over the k2tog rc= slip 2 stitches onto your cn & hold back knit 1 stitch from the left working needle knit the stitches from your cn lc= slip 1 stitch onto your cn & hold front knit 2 stitches from the left working needle knit the stitch from your cn c2f= slip 1 stitch onto your cn & hold front knit 1 stitch from the left working needle knit the stitch from your cn c2b= slip 1 stitch onto your cn & hold back knit 1 stitch from the left working needle knit the stitch from your cn forgottenyarn hinterland �  2 the pattern version one cast on 90 stitches brim k3p2 for 3-4 inches or until desired length is reached row 1 k1 p3 k1 p2 k9 p2 row 2 ktbl p3 ktbl p2 k9 p2 row 3 k1 p3 k1 p2 k9 p2 row 4 ktbl k3 ktbl p2 c6b k3 p2 row 5 k1 p3 k1 p2 k9 p2 row 6 ktbl p3 ktbl p2 k9 p2 row 7 k1 p3 k1 p2 k9 p2 row 8 ktbl k3 ktbl p2 k3 c6f p2 repeat row 1-8 until desired length ending with row 4 or 8 if ending with row 4 switch the following c4f/b accordingly decreasing -switching to dpns when necessary- row 1 k1 p2tog p1
